import css from './CurrencyConverter.module.css'; import give_arrow from '../images/give_arrow.png'; import get_arrow from '../images/get_arrow.png'; import Bitcoin from '../images/Bitcoin.png'; import Ethereum from '../images/Ethereum.png'; import USDT from '../images/USDT.png'; import USD from '../images/USD.png'; export default function CurrencyConverter() { return (

  • Bitcoin

); }
